attributes.action: reverse the policy of closing post offices and recognise their value instead
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Goverment should stop the post office closure programme and start recognising the important role played by the post office in local communities. If there is a good reason that the closure programme should go ahead the Goverment should come clean and explain what it is, as at the moment it looks like a vendetta against local comminities.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
